mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.program_id AS "programId.id", a.type_id AS "typeId.id", a.status AS "status", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.remark1 AS "remark1", cmsType.name AS "typeId.name"
LEFT JOIN cms_type cmsType ON cmsType.id = a.type_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_program_type( id, program_id, type_id, status, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, remark1 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{programId.id}, #{typeId.id}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{remark1} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_program_type SET program_id = #{programId.id}, type_id = #{typeId.id}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, remark1 = #{remark1} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cms_program_type WHERE type_id = #{typeId.id} AND program_id = #{programId.id}
